name: Tokyo Redemption
description:
🥊🥊🥊 Take revenge on Yakuzas!

The street aren't safe at night anymore in Neo-Tokyo. The city needs a hero to take care of the yakuzas!

Fight with different combat style depending on the color of your mask! Only you can save the city!

Dash through enemies, change combat style,  make amazing combos, reach huge scores and clean the streets of Neo-Tokyo!

Controls :

  • Use arrows to move
  • Right click to attack
  • Left click to change color and dash

A game made in 3 days for the  Video Game Lab : GameJam 2021

Pixel Art, SFX  : Cyrolis

Programming, FX : Blukulele

Music by Alumo : sptfy.com/alumo

It was a lot of fun to craft this game, hope you'll like it!
